name: Balmoral - Anejo XO Nicaragua - Petit Robusto FT
additionalNotes: Balmoral Anejo XO Nicaragua comes with a rich Nicaraguan Habano wrapper that lies a Cuban-seed Brazilian binder and one of the most unique filler blends we’ve ever seen. The finest, aged Dominican Olor and Nicaraguan Esteli leaves are mixed with Balmoral’s stalk-cut Brazilian Mata Norte, the special leaf responsible for most of the amazing flavors you get from Agio’s premium brand. It took Royal Agio quite some time to perfect this medium-full bodied blend, but when the rich earth and espresso flavors hit your palate.
